play.comments: It was difficult remembering all of the rules, but once we got going it was a great time.
Finished the 3rd tutorial mission and started the first real campaign mission.

item.name: Xia: Embers of a Forsaken Star
Xia: Legends of a Drift System
Xia: Legends of a Drift System

play.comments: We didn't quite follow the rules (on accident) which resulted in a pretty unbalanced experience.
Played with various people from Moen.
